newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: BANK/PORTUGAL SETS 50 BLN ESC VARIABLE RATE REPO.
newsitem.headline: BANK/PORTUGAL SETS 50 BLN ESC VARIABLE RATE REPO.

text.p: The Bank of Portugal offered to inject 50 billion escudos of five-day funds into the money market in a variable rate securities repurchase tender.

The central bank also offered to drain liquidity today with five-day certificates at a fixed rate of 5.40 percent. Its emergency lending rate for up to 100 billion escudos of one-day funds to resident banks stands at 7.40 percent.
Bids for the repo funds must be submitted by 0900 GMT and bids for the certificates by 1400 GMT.
